report.title: Phen Phun
report.author: Murple
report.bodytext: 11:30PM /n ------- /n I've been fasting since early yesterday evening (~30 hours). I /n have here one Mitsubishi pill (MDMA), 10mg of 2C-B (as 5mg pills), and 4mg /n (1/2 pill) of 2C-T-2. The plan is to take the MDMA first (as 2 halves, 15 /n minutes apart), then the 2C-T-2 when that begins to decline, then wait 20 /n minutes or so for potential nausea, then eat the 2C-B. This promises to be /n a good night! I've never had 2C-B before, so I'm trying to go for the /n Shulgin classic combination from PiHKAL. The 2C-T-2 is only to make up for /n the low dose of 2C-B, and hopefully will not too much color the /n experience. /n Well, half the MDMA is down the hatch! /n /n 11:45PM /n ------- /n Other half down! I think I'm already feeling the first half of the /n pill! Must be the fasting... fasting can make a massive difference. Alot /n of butterflies in my stomach. Bees. Wow. I've been wanting to do 2C-B for /n years, since reading the old Reed College 'bromomescaline' thing. Nexus. /n The elusive Erox. I hope this is as good as I've heard! /n /n 12:10AM /n ------- /n Damn, the MDMA is really beginning to kick in. Only 40 minutes in! /n Fasting definately makes a difference. Its been a while since I've fasted /n over 24 hours. /n /n 12:30AM /n ------- /n Wow... I'm going pretty good! I'm getting alot more than I have /n off these Mitsubishis before! I think I need to begin fasting before trips /n again. Not only does it make the onset faster and the effects stronger, /n but you feel alot 'cleaner' with an empty system. I wholeheartedly endorse /n a nice fast of 24 hours (or more) before most entheogens. /n /n 1:00AM /n ------ /n Down the hatch with the 2C-T-2! /n /n I'm in a great place. I read some email a friend sent me today /n which I found very touching. I spent some time thinking about that friend, /n and realized she truly is one of the treasures of my life. /n /n Spent some time laying down, just thinking. I love to do /n MDMA-class drugs alone or with a small group of friends. Doing it at raves /n or clubs is a waste. Too hectic for some of the sublter, delicious /n effects. Doing it alone is especially luxurious... you can melt into a /n wave of pure feeling. Lay down in a nice quiet dark room... maybe some /n mellow quiet music... nice! /n /n 1:23AM /n ------ /n I think the 2C-T-2 is coloring the MDMA some, hard to tell. /n Anyway, I just ate about one and half of one of the bees... I cut off /n about half of one and crushed it, to snort. Might as well, considering the /n small ammount I have. The stuff I powdered, I put into 4 *very* small /n lines. /n /n 1:40AM /n ------ /n Schnorrrt! First bump, not too bad... Second, not too bad there /n either. Two more... Third, in the other nostril - little sting. Nothing a /n squirt of saline nasal spray doesnt fix... All done! Not bad at all. /n Little bit of a bad taste, thats it. I assume the filler material in the /n pill probably buffered it alot. /n /n 1:50AM /n ------ /n Definately feeling alot more than MDMA now! Im feeling sweaty. /n Sorta mescaliney, but the body sensations are still all MDMA. But wow, /n they're increasing. /n /n 1:53AM /n ------ /n Whoops, just went from sweaty hot to cold. Here come the bees! /n /n 2:05AM /n ------ /n Wow. Very nice. I feel very cool, almost cold, despite still /n sweating a little from the MDMA. I feel very good, physically. It feels /n somewhat like a low dose of mescaline, or the latter part of my 2C-T-2 /n experience. Not outstandingly visual (yet?) but feels great physically and /n mentally. Only drawback - it seems to enhance the MDMA jaw clench quite a /n bit. Small price. /n /n 3:35AM /n ------ /n Im in a really interesting space. VERY nice. Much like mescaline, /n indeed! Similar to my San Pedro experiences, but milder on the body. I can /n feel the 2C-T-2 in there, and the MDMA... but theybe all melded into a /n nice whole. Colors stand out in razor sharp clarity. Very vivid, yet /n natural. Mescaline-type visuals overall. /n /n 3:45AM /n ------ /n Wow... this has only been 10 minutes? I must be experiencing some /n pretty heavy time distorions. Laying down in bed with my eyes closed I had /n some great closed eye visuals. I see things flitting around the corners of /n my vision with open eyes. Colors are ultra-crisp. I see little fractally /n overlays over alot of things. Shimmery and spider-weblike. Similar to what /n I've gotten from mescaline. Sounds of crickets outside are amplified and /n reverbate - natural music. Physical sensations are amazing. Not quite like /n mescaline or MDMA but about half way in between the two polarities. I can /n feel the MDMAishness fading some, but the 2C-B and definately the 2-C-T-2 /n are going strong still! In some ways theres a GHB-ish feel to the physical /n aspect. This is very interesting... and nice. /n /n /n 5:10AM /n ------ /n I'm still pretty stimulated, and my visual field is still pretty /n crisp, but I'm on my way down now. Out with a little pot and GHB, then /n sleep, I think! /n /n Conclusion /n ---------- /n Well, it took me till near 10AM to get to sleep. Perhaps the /n 2C-T-2 was responsible for that. There was a long lingering effect, with /n good visuals lasting the whole time. Phenethylamines are unlike /n tryptamines that way... the effects are more spread out and continuous, /n rather than the sharp peak, gradual decline, and long tail of tryptamines. /n It was definately a nice experience, and I hope someday to get to explore /n 2C-B at a more appropriate dosage range.
